rev.desc.rev.desc: Add the Unique Key comparation function before running Upgrade Package.
Modified panel: call.sqlupgrade.recs, modified its name from "call.sqlupgrade.recs" to "call.sqlupgradefield.recs"; and modified the parameter from "sqlupgrade" to "sqlupgradefield"
Added panel: call.sqlupgradekey.recs, added this panel to show the comparation result of Unqiue Key
check if has renamed records before load transfer
Remove exits to sql pre-upgrade report and create sql unload
Remove "Upgrade Reports" decision exits and related panels
Removed panels and decision exits from the rio panel for the following options: "Clear Upgrade SYSPUB Status", "View Upgrade Reports", the 2 options in the frame for "Upgrade log".
Added an exit to the panel call.apm.upgrade.data.scan
Added a call panel named 'call.apm.upgrade.data.scan' to call the 'apm.upgrade.data.scan' application with option 314
S2641 - TA4337: To add a new option to Upgrade menu for Ciew/Merge:
* Modified the start panel to add the new option 313 to the menu.
* Added call.upgraderesults.recs panel to call the database in order to allow for displaying the upgraderesults records.
Rally DE2576 - Added an exit to the panel call.apm.upgrade.load.transfer
Added a call panel named 'call.apm.upgrade.load.transfer' to call the 'apm.upgrade.load.transfer' application with option 312

descript.descript: Add the Unique Key comparation function before running Upgrade Package.
Modified panel: call.sqlupgrade.recs, modified its name from "call.sqlupgrade.recs" to "call.sqlupgradefield.recs"; and modified the parameter from "sqlupgrade" to "sqlupgradefield"
Added panel: call.sqlupgradekey.recs, added this panel to show the comparation result of Unqiue Key
check if has renamed records before load transfer
Remove exits to sql pre-upgrade report and create sql unload
Remove "Upgrade Reports" decision exits and related panels
Removed panels and decision exits from the rio panel for the following options: "Clear Upgrade SYSPUB Status", "View Upgrade Reports", the 2 options in the frame for "Upgrade log".
Added an exit to the panel call.apm.upgrade.data.scan
Added a call panel named 'call.apm.upgrade.data.scan' to call the 'apm.upgrade.data.scan' application with option 314
S2641 - TA4337: To add a new option to Upgrade menu for Ciew/Merge:
* Modified the start panel to add the new option 313 to the menu.
* Added call.upgraderesults.recs panel to call the database in order to allow for displaying the upgraderesults records.
Rally DE2576 - Added an exit to the panel call.apm.upgrade.load.transfer
Added a call panel named 'call.apm.upgrade.load.transfer' to call the 'apm.upgrade.load.transfer' application with option 312
